item.title: Susan add a quote by Max Lerner
item.description: "When choosing the lesser of two evils, always remember, it is still an evil." -- Max Lerner

item.title: Susan add a quote by Horace Mann
item.description: "Doing nothing for others is the undoing of ourselves." -- Horace Mann

item.title: Susan add a quote by Sheryl Crow
item.description: "Happiness is not having what you want, it is wanting what you have." -- Sheryl Crow

item.title: Susan add a quote by Samuel Johnson
item.description: "It is necessary to hope... for hope itself is happiness." -- Samuel Johnson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Lucille Ball
item.description: "Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. Your really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world." -- Lucille Ball

item.title: Susan add a quote by Cicely Veronica Wedgwood
item.description: "Discontenet and disorder are signs of energy and hope, not of despair" -- Cicely Veronica Wedgwood

item.title: Susan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Life consists of what man is thinking about all day." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Robert Louis Stevenson
item.description: "There is no duty we so much underrate as the duty of being happy. By being happy we sow anonymous benefits upon the world." -- Robert Louis Stevenson

item.title: Susan add a quote by William Wordsworth
item.description: "With an eye made quiet by the power of harmony, and the deep power of joy, we see into the life of things." -- William Wordsworth

item.title: Susan add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Susan add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "All that I am or ever hope to be, I owe to my angel mother." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Susan add a quote by Elizabeth Barrett Browning
item.description: "I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you" -- Elizabeth Barrett Browning

item.title: Susan add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough" -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Susan add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "The Constitution only guarantees the American people the right to pursue happiness. You have to catch it yourself." -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Susan add a quote by Einstein
item.description: "Once you can accept the universe as matter expanding into nothing that is something, wearing stripes with plaid comes easy." -- Einstein

item.title: Susan add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Susan add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Susan add a quote by A.A. Milne
Susan add a quote by Max Lucado
item.description: "Faith is not the belief that God will do what you want. It is the belief that God will do what is right." -- Max Lucado
